name: Little Lethal Cook
description:
Cook strange recipes to feed the monsters before they eat you. Be careful not to mistake the recipe. The more monsters you feed, the faster you will get out of this deadly kitchen! 

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys for move
Space to interact
Q or I to open Recipe Book

Little instruction: Read the order above the monster head > Find this recipe in the book > Find right ingredients in boxes and put to cookware in correct order > Utilize unwanted ingredients to hole on the floor > Sometimes you will get keys, collect all three to open the portal door and win.

Ingredients and recipes are different every time you start the game. 
Default window size is 512х512 pixels, but you can resize it with mouse as any other window.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2020.

Idea and art by me (Veksell)
Code by Yaroslav Adamov
Music and sound by kubikami
